Read more "Welcome to the Profile Menu!"
item.content:encoded:
UAS COLLAGE welcomes students from across the country and all over the world, with diverse backgrounds and far-ranging talents and interests.

From your professors and House advisers to your friends and teammates, UAS COLLAGE is a vibrant community where you can feel supported and encouraged. No matter where you come from, UAS COLLAGE is home.

A UAS COLLAGE education is more than coursework. It’s late-night discussions in the dining hall with friends, drama productions, fierce (or friendly) athletic competitions, outings to Boston’s museumsâ€”and much more.
Through extracurricular activities, you’ll meet new people, pursue your interests (or discover new ones), and enrich your understanding of the world and the people in it.

Need to know what’s on the menu tonight or when the next shuttle arrives? Get all the information you need to make it through your day.
